Song.title: When I Survey The Wondrous Cross (Traditional)
Song.copyright: Isaac Watts | Lowell Mason Â© Words: Public Domain Music: Public Domain

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [F]When I s[C]urv[F]ey [Gm/Bb]the [D/A] [Bb/G]wondr[F/C]ous [C] [F]cross On which the P[Bb]rince [F/A]of [Bb/G]glory [Csus C7]died [F]My rich[C]est g[F]ain [Gm/Bb]I [D/A] [Bb/G]count [F/C]but [C] [F]loss [F/E C/E] [Dm]And [Dm/C]pour [Am/C]cont[G/B]empt [G7/B]on [Bb6]all [Am/C]my [C7] p[F]ride
Verse 2: [F]Forbid [C]it L[F]ord [Gm/Bb]that [D/A] [Bb/G]I [F/C]shou[C]ld b[F]oast Save in the [Bb]death [F/A]of [Bb/G]Christ my [Csus C7]God [F]All the [C]vain th[F]ings [Gm/Bb]tha[D/A]t [Bb/G]charm [F/C]me [C] [F]most [F/E C/E] [Dm]I [Dm/C]sac[Am/C]ri[G/B]fice [G7/B]them [Bb6]to [Am/C]His [C7] [F]blood
Verse 3: [F]See from [C]His h[F]ead [Gm/Bb]His [D/A] [Bb/G]hands [F/C]Hi[C]s [F]feet Sorrow and [Bb]love [F/A]flow [Bb/G]mingled [Csus C7]down [F]Did ever [C]such l[F]ove [Gm/Bb]an[D/A]d [Bb/G]sor[F/C]row [C] [F]meet [F/E C/E] [Dm]Or [Dm/C]thorns [Am/C]com[G/B]pose [G7/B]so [Bb6]rich [Am/C]a [C7] [F]crown
Verse 4: [F]Were the [C]whole r[F]ealm [Gm/Bb]of [D/A] [Bb/G]nat[F/C]u[C]re [F]mine That were a [Bb]pres[F/A]ent [Bb/G]far too [Csus C7]small [F]Love so [C]am[F]a[Gm/Bb]zi[D/A]ng [Bb/G]so [F/C]d[C]i[F]vine [F/E C/E] [Dm]De[Dm/C]mands [Am/C]my [G/B]soul [G7/B]my [Bb6]life [Am/C - C]my [F]all
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 when i survey the wondrous cross on which the prince of glory died my richest gain i count but loss and pour contempt on all my pride verse 2 forbid it lord that i should boast save in the death of christ my god all the vain things that charm me most i sacrifice them to his blood verse 3 see from his head his hands his feet sorrow and love flow mingled down did ever such love and sorrow meet or thorns compose so rich a crown verse 4 were the whole realm of nature mine that were a present far too small love so amazing so divine demands my soul my life my all

Verse 3: [F]See from [C]His h[F]ead [Gm/Bb]His [D/A] [Bb/G]hands [F/C]Hi[C]s [F]feet Sorrow and [Bb]love [F/A]flow [Bb/G]mingled [Csus C7]down [F]Did ever [C]such l[F]ove [Gm/Bb]an[D/A]d [Bb/G]sor[F/C]row [C] [F]meet [F/E C/E] [Dm]Or [Dm/C]thorns [Am/C]com[G/B]pose [G7/B]so [Bb6]rich [Am/C]a [C7] [F]crown
